hidden_abilites: Increases the attack speed and movement speed of all units by 5%
Slows enemies, lowers accuracy, summons another Eagle that detects invisible units, and increases the attack speed and attack range of Eagles.
On first appearing, increases the movement speed and attack speed of all ally units, and casts shield to grant immunity against physical attacks for a certain period of time.
description.skill1: Increase HP of elf unit in Guild Raid (4.2%, 8.4%, 12.6%, 16.8%, 21%)
description.skill2: Increase attack power of elf unit in Guild Raid (4.2%, 8.4%, 12.6%, 16.8%, 21%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Druid ]
